inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity
| summarize count() by OfficeWorkload, bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| summarize count() by OfficeWorkload
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where ItemType != '' 
| summarize count() by ItemType
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| summarize count() by UserType
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Admin operations ordered by amount 
OfficeActivity 
| where UserType == 'Admin' 
| summarize count() by Operation 
| order by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity
| summarize Update = countif(Operation contains 'update'), Create = countif(Operation contains 'create'), Delete = countif(Operation contains 'delete'), Add = countif(Operation contains 'add') by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1d, now())

content.PartTitle: Update VS Create VS Add VS Delete

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d) 
| where Operation contains 'group' 
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) 
| extend Week = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), 'This Week', 'Last Week'), TimeGenerated = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), TimeGenerated, TimeGenerated + 7d)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d) 
| where Operation contains 'user' 
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) 
| extend Week = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), 'This Week', 'Last Week'), TimeGenerated = iff(TimeGenerated>ago(7d), TimeGenerated, TimeGenerated + 7d)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where Operation contains 'Folder' 
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where Operation contains 'File' 
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top sharepoint client IPS
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint')
| summarize Amount = count() by Operation
| top 10 by Amount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Files Downloaded by type
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint')
| where Operation == 'FileDownloaded'
| summarize count() by SourceFileExtension

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Files Uploaded by type 
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint') 
| where Operation == 'FileUploaded' 
| summarize count() by SourceFileExtension
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Top sharepoint sites 
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload in ('OneDrive', 'SharePoint') and Site_Url != '' 
| summarize Amount = count() by Site_Url 
| top 10 by Amount

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Mailbox Logins by hour
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' and Operation == 'MailboxLogin'
| summarize Logins = count() by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//Exchange operations that are performed by actors outside your organization - external
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange'
| where ExternalAccess == 'True' 
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_

content.PartSubTitle: (operations that are performed by actors outside your organization)

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'Exchange' 
| summarize count() by UserType 
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| summarize additions = countif(Operation contains 'add'), updates = countif(Operation contains 'Update'), deletions = countif(Operation contains 'Delete') by bin_at(TimeGenerated, 1h, now())

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
//AzureActiveDirectory operations over time 
OfficeActivity  
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory' 
| where Operation contains 'group' 
| summarize count() by Operation 
 | sort by count_

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
OfficeActivity 
| where OfficeWorkload == 'AzureActiveDirectory'
| where Operation contains 'user' and Operation != 'UserLoggedIn'
| summarize count() by Operation
 | sort by count_
